cards.title: The Equalizer
setup: Put {TheEqualizer} into play, “Locked On Target” side up. Put “Lucrative Contract” into play next to the hero character target with the second highest HP. Shuffle the villain deck and reveal cards until a Munition is revealed. Put that Munition into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into the villain deck.
gameplay: Whenever there are no Munitions in play, flip this card.
At the start of the villain turn, if there are no [b][i]Marked[/i][/b] hero targets in play, {TheEqualizer} has fulfilled her contract. Game Over.
At the end of the villain turn, activate each [u]salvo[/u] text on each villain Munition in play.
advanced: Whenever {TheEqualizer} is dealt 4 or more damage at once, flip this card.
flippedGameplay: At the start of the villain turn, {TheEqualizer} regains {H} HP.

At the end of the villain turn, reveal cards from the villain deck until a Munition is revealed. Put it into play. Discard the other revealed cards. Then, if there are any villain Munitions in play, flip this card.
flippedAdvanced: When {TheEqualizer} flips to this side, destroy an environment card. If a card was destroyed this way, {TheEqualizer} deals the {H - 2} hero targets with the highest HP 2 fire damage each.
cards.challengeText: Munitions are indestructible during the villain turn. {TheEqualizer}'s max HP for this game is 60.

openingLines.default: You brought friends? Good. That should make this interesting.

cards.title: Automatic Rifle
body: When another villain Munition enters play, activate this card's [u]salvo[/u] text, then destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: salvo
activatableAbilities.text: {TheEqualizer} deals the [b][i]Marked[/i][/b] target 3 projectile damage, then deals the {H - 1} non-[b][i]Marked[/i][/b] hero targets with the highest HP 3 projectile damage each. This card deals itself 2 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Listen, Amy, whatever your name{BR}is- you're leaving early today. Do you{BR}want it to be a sick day or a funeral?

cards.title: Body Armor
body: Reduce damage dealt to {TheEqualizer} and this card by 1.
If {TheEqualizer} would be dealt 4 or more damage at once, prevent that damage and destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: No documented powers, just a{BR}long trail of dead superhumans.{BR}She knew how to counter every one.

cards.title: Bombardment
body: {TheEqualizer} deals the hero with the most non-character cards in play {H - 1} sonic damage, then deals each hero target 2 fire damage.
Destroy {H} Equipment cards.

cards.title: Combat Shotgun
body: When another villain Munition enters play, activate this card's [u]salvo[/u] text, then destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: salvo
activatableAbilities.text: {TheEqualizer} deals the [b][i]Marked[/i][/b] target 4 projectile damage, then deals the {H - 2} non-[b][i]Marked[/i][/b] hero targets with the highest HP 2 projectile damage each. This card deals itself 2 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Feel free to get up close and{BR}personal. Makes it easier to aim.

cards.title: Contract Negotiations
body: The hero with the second highest HP may destroy all of their Ongoing and Equipment cards.
One player with no Ongoing or Equipment cards in play may move the Objective card next to one of their hero character targets.
{TheEqualizer} deals the [b][i]Marked[/i][/b] target 3 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't ditch paying jobs. I{BR}adjust rates. The blonde with the laser{BR}eyes calls for an adjustment.

cards.title: Deadeye Rifle
body: When another villain Munition enters play, activate this card's [u]salvo[/u] text, then destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: salvo
activatableAbilities.text: {TheEqualizer} deals the [b][i]Marked[/i][/b] target 5 irreducible projectile damage. This damage can't be redirected by non-villain cards. This card deals itself 2 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Wait, you're telling me she's{BR}been making all these shots without{BR}binocular vision?

cards.title: Depleted Uranium Rounds
body: Projectile damage dealt by {TheEqualizer} is irreducible.
When {TheEqualizer} deals projectile damage to a target, she also deals that target 1 toxic damage.
When a villain Munition is reduced to 0 or fewer HP, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Bulletproof, huh?{BR}Sounds like someone's been{BR}using the wrong bullets.

cards.title: Dual Pistols
body: When another villain Munition enters play, activate this card's [u]salvo[/u] text, then destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: salvo
activatableAbilities.text: {TheEqualizer} deals the [b][/i]Marked[/i][/b] target 3 projectile damage. Then, if this card has 6 or more HP, {TheEqualizer} deals the [b][/i]Marked[/i][/b] target 3 projectile damage. This card deals itself 2 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Oh, wow. You're a lot prettier{BR}than I-- ow! [b]Ow!![/b]

cards.title: HEIAP Shells
body: Increase projectile damage dealt by {TheEqualizer} by 1.
When {TheEqualizer} deals projectile damage to a target, that target deals itself 1 irreducible fire damage.
When a villain Munition is reduced to 0 or fewer HP, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Armor-piercing shell meets{BR}high-explosive payload. Match{BR}made in heaven.

cards.title: Herd the Target
body: {TheEqualizer} deals the non-[b][i]Marked[/i][/b] hero target with the highest HP {H + 1} projectile damage.
Destroy {H} hero Ongoing cards.
The next damage dealt to the [b][i]Marked[/i][/b] target is irreducible.

flavorQuotes.text: That's it - come and help your{BR}friend. Don't think too hard about your{BR}position. There's a good hero.

cards.title: Lucrative Contract
body: This card is indestructible.
The target next to this card is [b][i]Marked[/i][/b].

flavorQuotes.text: He's an idiot, sure, but his{BR}friends aren't pushovers. You'd better{BR}have a plan for when I'm done.

cards.title: Right Tool for the Job
body: Reveal cards from the villain deck until a Cartridge and a Munition are revealed. Put the first revealed Cartridge into play. Put the first revealed Munition into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards into the villain deck.
If no [u]salvo[/u] text has been activated this turn, {TheEqualizer} deals each non-villain target 1 irreducible projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: How does she have one of{BR}those? They were all supposed to be{BR}decommissioned years ago!

cards.title: Tactical Repositioning
body: Reduce damage dealt to {TheEqualizer} by 1.
Damage dealt by {TheEqualizer} is irreducible.
At the end of the villain turn, destroy all environment cards, then play the top card of the environment deck.
At the start of the villain turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Step one, rearrange battlefield.{BR}Step two, rearrange target's insides.

cards.title: Walking Arsenal
body: Redirect damage dealt by {TheEqualizer} to the hero target with the highest HP.

At the end of the villain turn, reveal all Munition cards from the villain trash. Shuffle those cards, put 2 of them into play at random, and discard the rest. If fewer than 2 cards entered play this way, {TheEqualizer} deals each hero target 2 projectile damage.
At the end of the villain turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: I'll cover you, Doc. You get the{BR}civilians outta here before someone{BR}catches a bad ricochet.
